SEARCH
Package pegasus.scheduler

Interface Scheduler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractScheduler, AtomicScheduler, SyncScheduler
public interface Scheduler
A scheduler can execute tasks on a regular basis.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearTasks()
    Clears the task list of this scheduler
    void
    interrupt()
    Stops executing tasks registered to this scheduler.
    boolean
    isRegistered(TaskRegistry task)
    Returns whether the provided task is registered to this scheduler.
    TaskRegistry
    registerDelayedTask(Task task, long delay)
    Registers the provided task to this scheduler to be executed once after the provided delay.
    TaskRegistry
    registerRepeatingTask(Task task, long interval)
    Registers the provided task to this scheduler to be executed regularly.
    TaskRegistry
    registerRepeatingTask(Task task, long interval, long delay)
    Registers the provided task to this scheduler to be executed regularly.
    void
    start()
    Starts executing tasks registered to this scheduler.
    void
    unregisterTask(TaskRegistry task)
    Unregisters the provided task.

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start()
      Starts executing tasks registered to this scheduler.

    • interrupt

      void interrupt()
      Stops executing tasks registered to this scheduler.

    • clearTasks

      void clearTasks()
      Clears the task list of this scheduler

    • isRegistered

      boolean isRegistered(TaskRegistry task)
      Returns whether the provided task is registered to this scheduler.
      Parameters:
      task - The task registry object of which to query
      Returns:
      true if the provided task is registered to this scheduler

    • registerDelayedTask

      TaskRegistry registerDelayedTask(Task task, long delay)
      Registers the provided task to this scheduler to be executed once after the provided delay.
      Parameters:
      task - The task of which to register to this scheduler
      delay - The initial delay of the task in milliseconds
      Returns:
      The resulting task registry object
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided task is null

    • registerRepeatingTask

      TaskRegistry registerRepeatingTask(Task task, long interval)
      Registers the provided task to this scheduler to be executed regularly. The scheduler will wait for the specified interval before the initial execution of the task.
      Parameters:
      task - The task of which to register to this scheduler
      interval - The interval of the task in milliseconds
      Returns:
      The resulting task registry object
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided task is null

    • registerRepeatingTask

      TaskRegistry registerRepeatingTask(Task task, long interval, long delay)
      Registers the provided task to this scheduler to be executed regularly. The scheduler will wait for the specified delay before the initial execution of the task.
      Parameters:
      task - The task of which to register to this scheduler
      interval - The interval of the task in milliseconds
      delay - The initial delay of the task in milliseconds
      Returns:
      The resulting task registry object
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided task is null

    • unregisterTask

      void unregisterTask(TaskRegistry task)
      Unregisters the provided task.
      Parameters:
      task - The task registry object referencing the task of which to unregister
